attributes.action: WE NEED SARAHS LAW IN NORTHERN IRELAND
attributes.additional_details: We would like a law introduced for Northern Ireland similar to that of Sarah's law to allow parents to find out when someone who is on the sex offenders list is living in close proximity to children. Whether that be at home, school or recreational spots so parents can be aware and accompany there child where necessary and or inform them of any extra stranger dangers where age appropriate. We need to keep our children safe and this would help us do so.
